instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2850 Wifi Connection torn off
threads.message: Hi, Sold a 2850 board customer broke a ton of things installing it.  We got it back and am attempting to repair the broken connections. The WiFi Connection was torn off on the front side all copper pads are missing. I Ran 4 wires that are under the chip and the rest of the connections in the front but im getting no WiFi Hardware to show up.  What im wondering is if my Attempted WiFi repair is not sufficient or if there may have been something along the line Fried. I went a head and monkeyed the thing by just replacing every wifi connection around it and on the backside as it was faster than testing everything.

threads.title: 820-2850 Wifi Connection torn off
threads.message:
Check AP_RESET_CONN_L, with airport card connected.
Also check diode mode to ground on all data lines.

threads.title: 820-2850 Wifi Connection torn off
threads.message:
Cheers. Lines 9 and 11 where touching. fixed that and all is good. 
Thanks
